00040 
00041 namespace Ogre
00042 {
00046     class _OgreExport ExternalTextureSourceManager : public Singleton<ExternalTextureSourceManager>
00047     {
00048     public:
00050         ExternalTextureSourceManager();
00052         ~ExternalTextureSourceManager();
00053 
00055         void setCurrentPlugIn( const String& sTexturePlugInType );
00056 
00058         ExternalTextureSource* getCurrentPlugIn( void ) const { return mpCurrExternalTextureSource; }
00059     
00062         void destroyAdvancedTexture( const String& sTextureName,
00063             const String& groupName = ResourceGroupManager::DEFAULT_RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME);
00064 
00067         ExternalTextureSource* getExternalTextureSource( const String& sTexturePlugInType );
00068

00071 
00087         static ExternalTextureSourceManager& getSingleton(void);
00103         static ExternalTextureSourceManager* getSingletonPtr(void);
00104     protected:
00105         //The current texture controller selected

00107         
00108         // Collection of loaded texture System PlugIns, keyed by registered type
00109         typedef std::map< String, ExternalTextureSource*> TextureSystemList;

00111     };
